greeting.title: Hello, I'm Alexandre
greeting.subTitle: I am a passionate developer since high school üöÄ Almost graduated from CESI Graduate School of Engineering üë®‚Äçüéì I have an experience of building Web applications with many backend & frontend frameworks.

cesi.name: CESI Graduate School of Engineering
cesi.subHeader: School of Engineering in Computer Science
cesi.desc: Team projects / Apprenticeship / Internships / Experience abroad

rte.desc: Web developer at RTE R√©seau de Transport d'Electricit√©. Development of an internal application as part of a team working using the SCRUM Agile method.

lunatech.desc: Use of the Quarkus framework to develop an internal solution. Requested Jamf and Slack APIs to control the laptops remotely.

ls2n.desc: Use of xAPI protocol to process Java and Kotlin unit tests result reports. Application of Python statistical study to identify learner weaknesses & strengths.

dga.desc: Development in Python of an automatic Word report generation solution, based on test results provided by TestLink.

tangram.name: Tangram solver
tangram.desc: Tangram solver on grid space. Define final model and solve it.

pathfinding.name: Pathfinding
pathfinding.desc: Grid map editor with implementation of pathfinding algorithms (JPS and A*). Performance comparison on randomly generated mazes with DFS and Fusion methods.

bobail.name: Bobail
bobail.desc: Development of a 2-player board game, management of a Room system. Implementation of the MinMax algorithm to create an intermediate-level AI.

cellularAutomaton.name: Cellular automaton
cellularAutomaton.desc: Development of a map editor to understand the concept of cellular automata (example with the game of life).

didactikRobot.name: DidactikRobot
didactikRobot.desc: Development of a pedagogical platform for learning the programming logic.

angularApp.name: Angular app
angularApp.desc: Development of a Todo List application with Angular linked to an API created in NodeJS.

graphGenerator.name: Graph generator
graphGenerator.desc: Mathematical graph manager. Generates cities using Voronoi diagrams.

kingsGame.name: King's game
kingsGame.desc: Real-time multiplayer game with global chat system.

abalone.name: Abalone
abalone.desc: Abalone board game developed on the basis of the Bobail project (presented before).

spaceRun.name: Space run
spaceRun.desc: High school project developed during my IT specialization. Space Invader-type game. Objective: go as far as possible while avoiding asteroids.

idleGame.name: Idle game
idleGame.desc: Small Idle-type game, the objective is to accumulate the most resources.

cityGenerator.name: City generator
cityGenerator.desc: Generation of coherent towns with roads, rails and houses. Vehicle movement system to explore the generated map.

lagrangeInterpolation.name: Lagrange interpolation
lagrangeInterpolation.desc: Implementation of Lagrange interpolator polynomials. The user places the points in the frame of reference and the program determines the function passing through all the points.

easySave.name: Easy save
easySave.desc: Development of a backup software (differential backup system, encryption, remote access...).

projectAdvancedAlgorithms.name: TSP/VRP
projectAdvancedAlgorithms.desc: Development of heuristics and metaheuristics (genetic algorithm, ant colony, taboo...) to optimize vehicle routes (VRP problem, TSP).

salesManagement.name: Sales management
salesManagement.desc: Development of a sales management software (inventory management, personnel, statistics...).

signalProcessing.name: Signal processing
signalProcessing.desc: Sound wave processing in Python (modulation, demodulation, coding, decoding...).

networksAndSystems.name: Networks and systems
networksAndSystems.desc: Audit of a network infrastructure, design of an architecture respecting customer constraints. Obtained CCNA1 (CISCO certification).

weatherStation.name: Weather station
weatherStation.desc: Creation of a weather station with an Arduino board and various sensors (temperature, pressure, humidity, GPS...).
